This is how HPS Brain Gym™ works

It’s easy to get your head around.

The HPS Brain Gym™

The HPS Brain Gym™ Program is an integrated solution based on scientific research. We provide evidence-based tools to improve brain health, a network of trained coaches who provide face-to-face and online personal coaching, and a digital platform to promote human connections and further learning. In the simplest terms, HPS Brain Gym™ supports your brain health, so burnout is the last thing on your mind.

The HPS Brain Gym™ Coaches

Our team of top behavioral specialists are uniquely trained to improve well-being, and help you build brain health in the service of beating burnout. Each employee user is assigned to a human Coach who guides you through your journey to train your brain. It’s a robust process, backed by science at every step. Through regular face-to-face sessions, our HPS Brain Gym™ Coaches help you and your people work towards your personal well-being goals.

The HPS Brain Gym™ Connect App

The HPS Brain Gym™ Connect App is your portal to the world of HPS Brain Gym™. The Connect App has it all, from surveys about who you are and how you're feeling to hours of curated well-being content, powered by neuroscience. Employees and Coaches can connect directly through our in-app call and message platform. If you're feeling sad, nervous, or happy, your Coach is one click away.

Put HPS Brain Gym™ to the test

Why wait? You’re here. Your brain is already telling you something. Sign up to one of our trials. When it comes to brain health, there’s no better time than right now.

Our Coaches

HPS Brain Gym™ Coaches are expert personal trainers for your brain. Their expertise in emotions and behaviors, and their specialized training in evidence-based well-being practices, will help you become the best version of yourself while on the job and outside of work.

The Brain Gym Connect App

The Brain Gym Connect App is your portal to the world of HPS Brain Gym™. The Connect App has it all, from surveys about who you are and how you're feeling to hours of curated well-being content. Employees and Coaches can connect directly through our in-app call and message platform. All of this is supported by a one-of-a-kind well-being AI program that is both curated, personalized, and generative (Brain Gym Bot). If you're feeling sad, nervous, or happy, your Coach is one click away.
